answers.answer: Hi,Yes,I think you should consult your Doctor to order a Mammogram or other tests that might be recommend just to be on the safe side.What you have could be just a skin problem or perhaps an infection that needs to be treated as soon as possible.Best wishes...

question: I'm 60 years old.  My left breast has had pain for over 2 weeks.  it is now full and heavy and I have a red rash.  I have also been very sick with flu like symptoms, a new rash that my dr. believes is Psoriasis; and now I have croup and heavy coughing.  My GP put me on 875 mg Augmentin a week ago.  my breast is hurting worse.  I have Type 1 Diabetes, Hashimotos, Fibromyalgia, Asthma, Gastroperisis and severe GERD.  I had to have a biopsy of right breast in Februarys, 2014 due to calcium deposits.  it was negative for cancer!  My sister had breast cancer 20 years ago and my Aunt died with breast cancer about 15 years ago.  I cant get into my gynecologist until 2-26.  should I go ahead with a mammogram before my appt.?
title: left breast pain and swelling-60 year old
